name: Fatima
description: Three young shepherds in FÃ¡tima, Portugal report visions of the Virgin Mary, inspiring believers and angering officials of the Church and the government, who try to force them to recant their story. Based on historical events.

review.author: gcjc1960
review.heading: A good attempt with Fatima
review.reviewBody: The 2020 version is a good attempt at telling the story of Fatima. However, many details were omitted which will leave the audience, who may not know the story well, scratching their heads in confusion. Far more could have been done to better explain what happened during the Miracle of the Sun.
